basic.Peptide Name: Peptide 5 (a fragment of an  Uncharacterized protein APU46894.1, Gly-rich; natural AMPs; bacteria, prokaryotes, UCLL1)
basic.Source: Lactobacillus fermentumstrain HF-D1, from the human microbiota:gut, symbiont bacteria
basic.Target Organism: Active against rod-shaped Gram- bacteria S. marcescens and P. aeruginosa. A suggested name for peptide 5 is fermentin.
